meanings.definition: Happening or occurring more than once
meanings.sent1: The song had a repeated chorus that everyone sang along to.
meanings.sent2: The teacher gave a repeated warning about not running in the hallway.
meanings.sent3: The repeated rain showers made the grass grow quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a repeated melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The repeated sound of the clock ticking filled the quiet room.

meanings.sent1: He made a repeated request for more time to finish the project.
meanings.sent2: The child's repeated apologies showed genuine remorse.
meanings.sent3: The repeated jokes from the comedian had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Her repeated questions started to annoy her friends.
meanings.sent5: The repeated knocks on the door made her curious about who was outside.

meanings.sent1: The repeated visits from the friendly neighbor always brightened her day.
meanings.sent2: The repeated phone calls from her mom reminded her to pick up groceries.
meanings.sent3: The repeated chirping of the birds signaled the start of a new day.
meanings.sent4: His repeated acts of kindness towards strangers inspired others to do the same.
meanings.sent5: The repeated waves crashing against the shore created a calming rhythm.
